description: Jane is a caring and trustworthy friend who often takes the lead in supporting others. She is the best friend of an individual currently facing a mental health crisis.
relationship: Jane is working closely with her friend John to organize a supportive intervention for their friend Emily, who is experiencing a mental health crisis. She also chats regularly in the "Circle Connect" Slack group with friends Tom, Lucas, Sarah, and Mike—Tom recently asked for life updates, and Lucas, Sarah, and Mike are excited about the upcoming virtual game night.
